name: Stylized Visual Style
description: Artistic interpretation with enhanced aesthetics, creative liberties, and distinctive visual flair

prompt.base: Stylized artistic interpretation, enhanced aesthetics, creative color palette, distinctive visual style, artistic liberties, expressive rendering, unique character design, creative composition
prompt.positive: stylized art, artistic interpretation, enhanced colors, creative design, expressive features, unique aesthetic, artistic flair, bold choices, creative lighting, distinctive style, visual appeal, artistic composition
prompt.negative: photorealistic, documentary style, mundane realism, unprocessed photography, plain appearance, generic look, standard photography

variations.name: Modern Stylized
variations.modifier: clean lines, bold colors, contemporary aesthetic, graphic design influence

variations.name: Painterly Stylized
variations.modifier: brush stroke effects, artistic texture, painter's interpretation, fine art quality

variations.name: Cel-Shaded
variations.modifier: flat color blocks, defined outlines, comic-inspired, bold shadows

examples: A character with enhanced features, bold color choices, artistic interpretation, distinctive visual style
A landscape with creative color palette, stylized forms, artistic composition, unique aesthetic
